name: Twee Integration for Vim
summary: Syntax highlighting and compiler support for twee interactive stories creator
description:
This adds syntax highlighting and compiler support for twee files (*.tw).
The syntax highlighting was prepared with a dark colorscheme in mind.

Typing :make in .tw files will run twee (1.7.5) on them and pipe it to an html file named as the current file. That is, running :make on fiction.tw will create the fiction.html file.

Twee (http://gimcrackd.com/etc/src/) is an interactive stories creation tool based on TyddlyWiki, developed by Chris Klimas.
install_details:
The installer requires Vimball.
Install the scripts by opening the file and sourceing it (:source %).
